name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red body color, reminiscent of the iconic rossoCorsa, and retroConsole buttons, Retrotron brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its classic arms and legs allow for precise movements and flexibility, while the redBlack screen displays crisp and clear visual output. Retrotron is a unique fusion of vintage aesthetics and cutting-edge technology.
